attributes.action: Have a vote of no confidence in George Osbourne MP (Chancillor).
attributes.additional_details:
George Osborne introduced the bedroom tax, cuts to working tax credits whilst the rich have been using tax avoidance schemes. And larger corporate businesses haven't paid tax.

The government have never pursued these people, but instead target the elderly and the most vulnerable.

He has cut funding for our armed forces, emergency services and cuts also to the NHS. Yet he takes extortionate bonuses and expenses for himself.
attributes.background:
Whilst being Chancillor of this Conservative Government George Osbourne has acted with complete negligence as towards welfare cuts towards hard working families, the elderly, and the most vulnerable members of our society. 

The Conservative Government looks after the rich only.
